title: Laurie McCanna
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101042329/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101042329/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers): Laurie McCanna**

Designed several faces for the [Nimx](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101042329/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nimx) foundry in the early 1990s. Laurie has been the proprietor of [Laurie McCanna's Free Art Site](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101042329/http:/www.mccannas.com/) since 1995 - providing inspiration, tools, tutorials. and recommended reading for designers and publishers. (Actually, the site has quite a bit more than free art.) Some of the typefaces designed by Laurie include Nimx Jitterbug and Nimx Holiday Mix, a collection of festive icons.

Website:

[http://www.mccannas.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101042329/http:/www.mccannas.com/ "http://www.mccannas.com/")

author: paul d hunt
